Pre-Game Insights: The Dallas Mavericks will face the San Antonio Spurs in NBA action at American Airlines Center on Sunday, starting at 12:30pm AEDT.
With the likes of Luka Doncic, Kyrie Irving and Klay Thompson, the Mavericks are aiming to beat a Spurs team that includes Zach Collins, Keldon Johnson and Stephon Castle.
Stats Insider's predictive analytics model gives the Mavericks an 84% chance of defeating the Spurs at American Airlines Center.
The Mavericks are listed as 13.5-point favourites against the Spurs, with odds of $1.91 available at Bet365.
According to Stats Insider's analytics model, the Spurs (+13.5) are predicted to cover the line 56% of the time, while the 229-point over/under is considered an equal 50-50 chance of hitting.
Stats Insider's predicted final score for Mavericks vs Spurs at American Airlines Center this Sunday is the Mavericks winning 120-108.
Luka Doncic is expected to lead the Mavericks with 30 points, 9 rebounds and 8 assists, while Zach Collins is projected to finish with 14 points, 7 rebounds and 5 assists for the Spurs.
